Project 2: Financial Data Analysis (Stocks/Expenses)
Objective: Analyze stock market trends or personal finance data.

Dataset:
Use Yahoo Finance (AAPL Stock) or generate synthetic expense data with columns:

Date, Description, Category, Amount, Payment_Method

Step-by-Step Questions:
Beginner (Data Cleaning & Aggregation)
Load and inspect the dataset.

Handle missing values (if any) and duplicates.

Convert Date to datetime format.


Calculate total spending per category.

Find the average transaction amount.

Intermediate (Time Series & Visualization)
Plot a line chart of daily closing prices (for stocks).

Calculate moving averages (7-day and 30-day).

Identify the day with the highest trading volume.

Compute monthly spending trends.

Use seaborn to plot a distribution of expenses.

Advanced (Predictive & Automation)
Calculate daily returns (for stocks).

Use statsmodels to detect seasonality.

Build a simple expense forecasting model (linear regression).

Automate a monthly expense report.

Detect anomalies using Z-score.
